DOC.brief_summary: The purpose 12-week study determine compete physical activity program buddy help increase daily physical activity compare complete physical activity program without buddy .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Physically inactive , 2. least one child age less 5 year , 3. least one family member friend support physical activity engagement reside community , 4. access computer phone , 5. overweight/obese ( Body Mass Index : 23 kg/m2 ) 1 . Having know medical condition prevent regular physical activity 2. current participation lifestyle modification program
